attributes.title: 2022 Nissan Terra 2.5D XE Auto

attributes.description: The Mazda CX30 is the latest addition to the Mazda range and is also our second 7th generation car. The Dynamic is the middle of the range. Some of the stunning features include, heads up display, dual zone climate control, LED lighting, auto lights and wipers, Apple Car Play/Android Auto, Keyless access and walkaway lock, cruise control, drive away lock, rear park distance control with a high quality and durable cloth interior. The CX30 also comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage Service Plan and Warranty, with the option of extending and 3 year Roadside Assistance.
